meanings.sent1: She had a yen for chocolate all day.
meanings.sent2: His yen for adventure led him to explore new places.
meanings.sent3: Her yen for excitement made her jump up and down with joy.
meanings.sent4: The yen for knowledge burned within him like a fierce flame.
meanings.sent5: The yen for success drove her to work hard and never give up.

meanings.definition: The basic monetary unit of Japan.
meanings.sent1: He exchanged his dollars for yen at the bank.
meanings.sent2: The price of the souvenir was in yen, not dollars.
meanings.sent3: She saved every yen she earned in a special piggy bank.
meanings.sent4: The yen in his wallet reminded him of his trip to Japan.
meanings.sent5: The vending machine accepted only yen coins for drinks.

meanings.definition: To have a strong desire or longing for something.
meanings.sent1: He yenned for a new bike for his birthday.
meanings.sent2: She yens to travel the world and see new sights.
meanings.sent3: The cat yenned for attention by rubbing against her legs.
meanings.sent4: The flowers in the garden yenned for sunlight after a rainy day.
meanings.sent5: The student yenned for knowledge and eagerly read every book in the library.
